name: .GOO File Extension
summary: Learn about .GOO files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open GOO files with ELEGOO SatelLite in WIndows. To open a GOO file, click the menu icon (three horizontal lines) in the upper-left corner of the app and select Open.
ELEGOO SatelLite can convert GOO files to various file types, including the following formats:
